name: WebGL2RenderingContext.getQuery
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.getQuery() method of the WebGL 2 API returns the currently active WebGLQuery for the target, or null.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'getQuery' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.
